Claims.Text: Children normally think that their parents are somehow special and that makes them the most important people in the children’s lives
the things that parents say have great power to their child
their parents have more time to teach him/her than anybody else
children usually mirror themselves on their parents

Premises.Text: More power than any friend or other adult could have

if someone tells a kid that something is wrong and they shouldn't do it, but his father told him/her that it was right, the kid will listen to the father instead of the other person, even if his father is wrong
a child normally spends more time with their parents than with other people
They have more contact and more intimacy with their children
even if the parents don’t intend to teach their children something, they are always observing and learning by themselves
if there is a man that beats his wife and treats her bad, his child probably is going to be rude and treat girls bad
